name: Blob Seizer
description:
In Blob Seizer, you must abduct blobs to restore your health that is constantly draining itself due to a virus you caught !

Doing so, you will carry them on top of your head, restricting your ability to move.

You can then merge with them (by pressing M), but you will thereby move slower and slower ...

Who will seize the most blobs ?

(Only available in 1600x800 for now)
